name: Anko Mitarashi
description: A kunoichi and former student of Orochimaru.

name: Asuma Sarutobi
description: A member of the Sarutobi clan and leader of Team 10.

name: Baki
description: A jonin from Sunagakure and mentor to the Sand Siblings.

name: Chiyo
description: A retired puppeteer and elder of Sunagakure.

name: Choji Akimichi
description: A member of Team 10 and the Akimichi clan.

name: Dan Kato
description: A medical ninja and Tsunade's lover.

name: Deidara
description: A rogue ninja and member of the Akatsuki known for his explosive art.

name: Dosu Kinuta
description: A genin from Otogakure who uses sound-based attacks.

name: Ebisu
description: A special jonin and Naruto's temporary tutor.

name: Gaara
description: The Fifth Kazekage and a jinchuriki of the One-Tail.

name: Genma Shiranui
description: A special jonin known for his laid-back demeanor.

name: Haku
description: A loyal follower of Zabuza with a tragic past.

name: Hayate Gekko
description: A special jonin and proctor of the Chunin Exams.

name: Hiashi Hyuga
description: The head of the Hyuga clan and father of Hinata.

name: Hidan
description: A member of the Akatsuki who practices a deadly ritualistic jutsu.

name: Hinata Hyuga
description: A member of Team 8 and heir to the Hyuga clan.

name: Hiruzen Sarutobi
description: The Third Hokage and a wise leader of the village.

name: Hizashi Hyuga
description: Hiashi's twin brother and a member of the Hyuga clan's branch family.

name: Ibiki Morino
description: The head of the Konoha Torture and Interrogation Force.

name: Ino Yamanaka
description: A member of Team 10 and the Yamanaka clan.

name: Iruka Umino
description: A kind-hearted academy instructor and Naruto's mentor.

name: Itachi Uchiha
description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan and member of the Akatsuki.

name: Jiraiya
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and Naruto's mentor.

name: Jirobo
description: A member of the Sound Four with immense physical strength.

name: Kabuto Yakushi
description: A spy and right-hand man of Orochimaru.

name: Kakashi Hatake
description: The leader of Team 7 and a skilled jonin.

name: Kakuzu
description: A member of the Akatsuki who uses forbidden jutsu to extend his life.

name: Kankuro
description: A puppet master and brother of Gaara.

name: Kiba Inuzuka
description: A member of Team 8 who fights alongside his dog Akamaru.

name: Kidomaru
description: A member of the Sound Four who uses spider-like techniques.

name: Kimimaro
description: The last member of the Kaguya clan and Orochimaru's loyal servant.

name: Kisame Hoshigaki
description: A member of the Akatsuki known as the Monster of the Hidden Mist.

name: Kurenai Yuhi
description: A jonin and leader of Team 8.

name: Might Guy
description: A taijutsu master and leader of Team Guy.

name: Naruto Uzumaki
description: The protagonist of the series and jinchuriki of the Nine-Tails.

name: Neji Hyuga
description: A prodigy of the Hyuga clan and member of Team Guy.

name: Obito Uchiha
description: A former member of Team Minato and key figure in the Akatsuki.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and a rogue ninja.

name: Rin
description: A member of Team Minato and a medical ninja.

name: Rock Lee
description: A taijutsu specialist and member of Team Guy.

name: Sai
description: A member of Team 7 and a skilled artist ninja.

name: Sakon
description: A member of the Sound Four with a unique twin-fighting style.

name: Sakura Haruno
description: A member of Team 7 and a skilled medical ninja.

name: Sasori
description: A puppet master and member of the Akatsuki.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
description: A member of Team 7 and the last surviving Uchiha clan member.

name: Shikamaru Nara
description: A member of Team 10 and a tactical genius.

name: Shino Aburame
description: A member of Team 8 who uses insects in battle.

name: Shizune
description: Tsunade's assistant and a skilled medical ninja.

name: Tayuya
description: A member of the Sound Four who uses genjutsu through her flute.

name: Temari
description: A kunoichi from Sunagakure and sister of Gaara.

name: Tenten
description: A member of Team Guy and a weapons specialist.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and the Fifth Hokage.

name: Ukon
description: A member of the Sound Four and Sakon's twin.

name: Yamato
description: A member of Team Kakashi and a user of Wood Release.

name: Yashamaru
description: Gaara's caretaker and uncle.

name: Zabuza Momochi
description: A rogue ninja known as the Demon of the Hidden Mist.

name: Zaku Abumi
description: A genin from Otogakure who uses air pressure attacks.

name: Madara Uchiha
description: A legendary shinobi, co-founder of Konoha, and major antagonist in the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Pain
description: Nagato's alias and leader of Akatsuki, wielding the Rinnegan and Six Paths of Pain.

name: Killer B
description: The Eight-Tails jinchuriki, a skilled rapper and swordsman from Kumogakure.

name: Guren
description: An anime-original kunoichi with Crystal Release, served under Orochimaru.

name: Kaguya Otsutsuki
description: The progenitor of chakra and final antagonist of Naruto Shippuden.

name: White Zetsu
description: A member of Akatsuki with cloning and merging abilities, created from Infinite Tsukuyomi victims.

name: Allied Shinobi Forces
description: A coalition of the five great villages formed to fight Akatsuki in the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Rinji
description: An anime-original character who served under Orochimaru and controlled animals.

name: Tailed Beasts
description: Nine giant chakra creatures created from the Ten-Tails, each with unique abilities.

name: Gozu
description: An anime-only bodyguard of Guren, known for his ox-like physique and loyalty.

name: Three-Tails
description: Isobu, the Three-Tails, is a turtle-like Tailed Beast once sealed in Yagura.

name: Mecha-Naruto
description: A robotic parody of Naruto from the Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution game.

name: Danzo Shimura
description: A Konoha elder and leader of Root, obsessed with the village's protection.

name: Reanimated Shinobi
description: Deceased ninja revived by Kabuto during the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Utakata
description: The Six-Tails jinchuriki from Kirigakure, known for Soap Bubble Ninjutsu.

name: Ten-Tails
description: The original source of all Tailed Beasts, central to the Eye of the Moon Plan.

name: Jugo
description: A member of Taka with the ability to absorb natural energy and go berserk.

name: Karin
description: A sensor-type kunoichi from the Uzumaki clan and member of Taka.

name: Fourth Raikage
description: A, the Fourth Raikage, is Kumogakure's leader, famed for strength and speed.

name: Suigetsu
description: A former test subject of Orochimaru and member of Taka from Kirigakure.

name: Konan
description: A founding member of Akatsuki, known for her Paper Release techniques.

name: Third Tsuchikage
description: Onoki, the Third Tsuchikage of Iwagakure, mastered Dust Release.
